member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Commisions
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about commisions

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Commisions.GetCommissions(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.CommissionQueriesContainer)
member.summary: Gets all commissions and possible reductions by EAN, condition and optionally price. No more than 100 EAN`s can be sent in a single request.
member.param: Object that holds properties which get queried

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Commisions.GetCommissionByEAN(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Decimal})
member.summary: Commissions can be filtered by condition, which defaults to NEW. If price is provided, the exact commission amount will also be calculated.
member.param: The EAN number associated with this product.
The condition of the offer.
The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator. The price should always have two decimals precision.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Insights
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about insights

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Inventory
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about the inventory

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Invoices
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about invoices

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Invoices.GetAllInvoices(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of invoices, by default from the past 4 weeks. The optional period-start and period-end parameters can be used together to retrieve invoices from a specific date range in the past, the period can be no longer than 31 days. Invoices and their specifications can be downloaded separately in different media formats with the ‘GET an invoice by id’ and the ‘GET an invoice specification by id’ calls. The available media types differ per invoice and are listed per invoice within the response. Note: the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.
member.param: Period start date
Period end date

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Invoices.GetInvoiceById(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an invoice by invoice id. The available media types differ per invoice and are listed within the response from the ‘GET all invoices’ call. Note: the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.
member.param: The id of the invoice

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Invoices.GetInvoiceSpecificationById(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an invoice specification for an invoice with a paginated list of its transactions. The available media types differ per invoice specification and are listed within the response from the ‘GET all invoices’ call. Note, the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.
member.param: The id of the invoice.
The page to get. Each page contains a maximum of 110.000 lines.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about offers

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.CreateNewOffer(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer)
member.summary: Creates a new offer, and adds it to the catalog. After creation, status information can be retrieved to review if the offer is valid and published to the shop.
member.param: The offer to create

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.RequestOfferExportFile(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.OfferExportConfiguration)
member.summary: Request an offer export file containing all offers.
member.param: The file format in which to return the export. Defaults to "CSV"

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.RetrieveOfferExportFile(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve an offer export file containing all offers.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer export.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.GetOfferExportFile(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.OfferExportConfiguration,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Requests and Retrieves offer export file containing all offers. *Warning* Can take up to multiple minutes to complete, depending on how fast bol creates its csv If called once subsequent calls will fail until BOL has released its delay for repeating this process (somewhere between 30 minutes - 1 hour)
member.param: The file format in which to return the export. Defaults to "CSV"
The maximum amount of milliseconds this task is allowed to take. (overwritten by passing a cancellationToken)
Cancellation token allowing customized cancellation configuration, overwrites maxMsDuration.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.GetOffer(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve an offer by using the offer id provided to you when creating or listing your offers.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.UpdateOffer(System.String,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.UpdateOffer)
member.summary: Use this endpoint to send an offer update. This endpoint returns a process status.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer.
Offer update container.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.DeleteOffer(System.String)
member.summary: Delete an offer by id.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.UpdateOfferPrice(System.String,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.PricingContainer)
member.summary: Update price for offer by id. The flow is designed to facilitate the planned offering of bundle discounts. This is not yet available. Therefore, the ‘quantity’ field should always contain the value ‘1’, and the price should represent the single unit price.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer.
New pricing for the offer.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.UpdateOfferStock(System.String,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Stock)
member.summary: Update stock for offer by id.
member.param: Unique identifier for an offer.
New stock for the offer.

member.summary: Request an unpublished offer report containing all unpublished offers and reasons.
member.param: File format container defaults to "CSV"

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Offers.RetrieveUnpublishedOfferReport(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve an unpublished offer report containing all unpublished offers and reasons.
member.param: Unique identifier for unpublished offer report.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Orders
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about orders

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Orders.GetOpenOrders(System.Int32,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.FulFilmentMethod)
member.summary: Gets a paginated list of all open orders sorted by date in descending order.
member.param: The requested page number with a pagesize of 50
The fulfilment method. Fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Orders.GetOrder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an order by order id.
member.param: The id of the order to get.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Orders.CancelOrderByOrderItemId(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.OrderItemCancellationContainer)
member.summary: This endpoint can be used to either confirm a cancellation request by the customer or to cancel an order you yourself are unable to fulfil.
member.param: Items to cancel (use CancelReason enum)

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Orders.ShipOrderItem(Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.ShippingInfo)
member.summary: Ship a single order item within a customer order by providing shipping information. In case you purchased a shipping label you can add the shippingLabelCode to this message. In that case the transport element must be left empty. If you ship the item(s) using your own transporter method you must omit the shippingLabelCode entirely.
member.param: The order item being confirmed.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Pricing
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about Pricing

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Pricing.GetRetailPricingInformationForEAN(System.String)
member.summary: V4 BETA: Retrieve retail price information for an EAN. Currently this endpoint only supports the allowable retail price and can support the following use cases: 1) EANs that have been unpublished due to price related reasons can be checked against this endpoint. 2) Requesting the allowable retail price for EANs that are not yet in your assortment can help inform price setting.
member.param: The EAN number associated with this product.
member.returns: A list of retail prices and countries

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ProcessStatuses
member.summary: Contains all functions used to communicate to BOL about process statuses

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ProcessStatuses.GetProcessStatusByEntityAndEvent(System.String,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ProcessEventType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a list of process statuses, which shows information regarding previously executed PUT/POST requests in descending order. You need to supply an entity id and event type.
member.param: The entity id is not unique so you need to provide an event type. The entity id can either be order item id, transport id, return number or inbound reference.
The event type can only be used in combination with the entity id.
The requested page number with a pagesize of 50

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ProcessStatuses.GetStatusByProcessId(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a specific process-status, which shows information regarding a previously executed PUT/POST request. All PUT/POST requests on the other endpoints will supply a process-status-id in the related response. You can use this id to retrieve a status by using the endpoint below.
member.param: The id of the process status being requested. This id is supplied in every response to a PUT/POST request on the other endpoints.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ProcessStatuses.GetProcessStatusesByIds(System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieve a list of process statuses, which shows information regarding previously executed PUT/POST/DELETE requests. No more than 1000 process status id's can be sent in a single request.
member.param: Array of objects (ProcessStatusId)

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Returns
member.summary: Contains all possible interactions with bol about Returns

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Returns.GetReturns(System.Int32,System.Boolean,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.FulFilmentMethod)
member.summary: Get a paginated list of all returns, which are sorted by date in descending order.
member.param: The requested page number with a pagesize of 50
The status of the returns you wish to see, shows either handled or unhandled returns.
The fulfilment method. Fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Returns.GetReturnByRMAId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a return based on the rma id.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.Returns.HandleReturn(System.Int32,Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandleReturnContainer)
member.summary: Allows the user to handle a return. This can be to either handle an open return, or change the handlingResult of an already handled return. The latter is only possible in limited scenarios, please check the returns documentation for a complete list.
member.param: The RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) id that identifies this particular return.
An object that holds the handling result and quantity of the returned product.

member.summary: A paginated list to retrieve all your shipments up to 3 months old. The shipments will be sorted by date in descending order.

The id of the order. Only valid without fulfilment-method. The default fulfilment-method is ignored.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.BolApiCaller
member.summary: This class is the core of the bolapi project. It is used to call api endpoints through statically typed code. Each property on this class is used as a seperation of logic to easily find what api calls you are looking for.

member.name: M:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.BolApiCaller.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor used to create an instance of the BolApiCaller
member.param: The api clientId required for authorization, requestable from bol itself.
The api clientSecret required for authorization, requestable from bol itself.
If set to true all calls will be directed at bol's demo test environment, this should never be used unless you want to invoke calls without processing them.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult
member.summary: Set of results used when handling a return

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.RETURN_RECEIVED
member.summary: Return is received as expected and approved.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.EXCHANGE_PRODUCT
member.summary: In consultation with the customer, the product will be exchanged or replaced.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.RETURN_DOES_NOT_MEET_CONDITIONS
member.summary: Return did not met the expectation/condition.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.REPAIR_PRODUCT
member.summary: You will take the lead in repairing the product for the customer.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.CUSTOMER_KEEPS_PRODUCT_PAID
member.summary: Customer is allowed to keep the product.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.STILL_APPROVED
member.summary: In consultation with the customer, the return is still approved after an initial rejection. With this handling result, you can still refund the customer.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.CUSTOMER_KEEPS_PRODUCT_FREE_OF_CHARGE
member.summary: Customer is allowed to keep the product with no costs.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.RETURN_ITEM_LOST
member.summary: Somewhere on it’s way back to the seller the return item was lost

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.EXPIRED
member.summary: The time between registering a return and sending it back took more than 21 days. The return is therefore cancelled.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.EXCESSIVE_RETURN
member.summary: Feedback with more quantity than ordered was supplied.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.STILL_RECEIVED
member.summary: The return was reported lost but was still received.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.CANCELLED_BY_CUSTOMER
member.summary: The customer decided to cancel his/her return

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.HandlingResult.FAILED_TO_CREATE_SHIPPING_LABEL
member.summary: The transporter failed to create a shipping label. The return is therefore cancelled.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason
member.summary: If a customer specifies the reason why the item is returned, one of these return reasons can be selected

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.INCORRECT_PRODUCT_INFORMATION
member.summary: Incorrect information on website

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.WRONG_SIZE_ORDERED
member.summary: Customer ordered wrong size

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.WRONG_ARTICLE_RECEIVED
member.summary: Wrong item delivered to customer

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.ARTICLE_DAMAGED
member.summary: Article was damaged when received

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.ARTICLE_BROKEN
member.summary: Article is not working or is broken

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.ARTICLE_DELIVERY_TOO_LATE
member.summary: Item not delivered in time

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.ARTICLE_INCOMPLETE
member.summary: Part(s) missing for the item

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.WRONG_ARTICLE_ORDERED
member.summary: Customer ordered wrong article

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ReturnReason.OTHER
member.summary: If no other reason is applicable

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Condition.Name
member.summary: The condition of the offered product.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Condition.Category
member.summary: The category of the condition. If not given NEW or SECONDHAND is derived from NAME.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Condition.Comment
member.summary: The description of the condition of the product. Only allowed if name is not NEW and may not contain e-mail addresses. Max 2000 characters.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Ean
member.summary: The EAN number associated with this product. Note: in case an ISBN is provided, the ISBN will be replaced with the actual EAN belonging to this ISBN.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Condition
member.summary: Condition of the offer.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Reference
member.summary: A user-defined reference that helps you identify this particular offer when receiving data from us. This element can optionally be left empty and has a maximum amount of 20 characters.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.OnHoldByRetailer
member.summary: Indicates whether or not you want to put this offer for sale on the bol.com website. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.UnknownProductTitle
member.summary: In case the item is not known to bol.com you can use this field to identify this particular product. Note: in case the product is known to bol.com, the unknown product title will not be stored.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Pricing
member.summary: Pricings for the offer.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Stock
member.summary: Stocks for the offer

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.CreateOffer.Fulfilment
member.summary: Fulfilment specifications for the offer.

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.FulFilmentMethod.FBB
member.summary: FulfilledByBol

member.name: F:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.FulFilmentMethod.FBR
member.summary: FulfilledByRetailer

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Fulfilment.Method
member.summary: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB). Defaults to FBR.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Fulfilment.DeliveryCode
member.summary: The delivery promise that applies to this offer. Valid codes: ("24uurs-23","24uurs-22","24uurs-21","24uurs-20","24uurs-19","24uurs-18","24uurs-17","24uurs-16","24uurs-15","24uurs-14","24uurs-13","24uurs-12","1-2d","2-3d","3-5d","4-8d","1-8d")

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.PricingContainer.BundlePrices
member.summary: A set of prices (containing a quantity and selling price) that apply to this offer.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.RetailPricing.RetailPrices
member.summary: A set of prices (containing a quantity and selling price) that apply to this offer.

member.name: T:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.ShippingInfo
member.summary: Ship a single order item within a customer order by providing shipping information. In case you purchased a shipping label you can add the shippingLabelCode to this message. In that case the transport element must be left empty. If you ship the item(s) using your own transporter method you must omit the shippingLabelCode entirely.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.ShippingInfo.ShipmentReference
member.summary: Used for administration purposes.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.ShippingInfo.ShippingLabelId
member.summary: Specifies shipping label to be used for this shipment. Can be retrieved through the shipping label endpoint.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.ShippingInfo.Transport
member.summary: TransportInstruction

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.SmallFulfilment.Method
member.summary: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB). Defaults to FBR.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.SmallFulfilment.DeliveryCode
member.summary: The delivery promise that applies to this offer. Valid codes: ("24uurs-23","24uurs-22","24uurs-21","24uurs-20","24uurs-19","24uurs-18","24uurs-17","24uurs-16","24uurs-15","24uurs-14","24uurs-13","24uurs-12","1-2d","2-3d","3-5d","4-8d","1-8d")

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Stock.Amount
member.summary: The amount of stock available for the specified product present in the retailers warehouse. Note: this should not be the FBB stock! Defaults to 0.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Stock.ManagedByRetailer
member.summary: Configures whether the retailer manages the stock levels or that bol.com should calculate the corrected stock based on actual open orders. In case the configuration is set to 'false', all open orders are used to calculate the corrected stock. In case the configuration is set to 'true', only orders that are placed after the last offer update are taken into account. Default is set to 'false'.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Transport.TransporterCode
member.summary: Specify the transporter that will carry out the shipment.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.Transport.TrackAndTrace
member.summary: The track and trace code that is associated with this transport.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.UpdateOffer.Reference
member.summary: A user-defined reference that helps you identify this particular offer when receiving data from us. This element can optionally be left empty and has a maximum amount of 20 characters.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.UpdateOffer.OnHoldByRetailer
member.summary: Indicates whether or not you want to put this offer for sale on the bol.com website. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.UpdateOffer.UnknownProductTitle
member.summary: In case the item is not known to bol.com you can use this field to identify this particular product. Note: in case the product is known to bol.com, the unknown product title will not be stored.

member.name: P:Twinvision.BolRetailerApi.ObjectDefinitions.UpdateOffer.Fulfilment
member.summary: Offer fulfilment specification.
